backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profiles, role checks, job postings, candidate/employer profiles, and application storage with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend brand‑token, component‑system, and visual‑theme features with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of major frontend files, components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining CSS variable tokens, light/dark theme values, and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup with TanStack Router, shared layout, marketing pages, jobs pages, and dashboard routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal collecting user name, email, and role, then saving the profile via backend query with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppR: Guards children by checking user profile role and displays loading, missing profile, or access denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated and has a profile before rendering children, otherwise shows login or setup prompts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/StickyNav: Provides a sticky responsive navbar with navigation links, authentication handling, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/states/EmptyStat: Displays an empty-state message with an icon, description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/states/InlineAle: Shows an inline alert with variant-based styling and optional title.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton components for job cards, job details, and application cards during loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, candidate, employer, and job data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, brand color tokens, typography rules, and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into readable user-facing messages with special handling for auth and validation cases.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Implements a hook to update document title and meta/OG tags for SEO.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains helper functions for class merging and formatting salaries and dates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/AdminPage.t: Renders the admin dashboard page with SEO setup and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/candidate/C: Shows a candidate's job applications with status, job lookup, loading states, and error handling.
Provides candidate dashboard links to manage profile and view applications with SEO and role protection.
Form page for candidates to view and update their profile fields using query hooks and mutation.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardIn: Redirects authenticated users to their role-specific dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/employer/Em: Displays applications for a selected job, with filters, loading states, and status update actions.
Form for employers to view and update their company profile information.
Employer dashboard showing navigation cards to company profile, jobs, and applications.
Loads an existing job and provides a form to edit and update job details.
Form for creating a new job posting, including slug generation and submission.
Employer dashboard page listing the user's jobs with edit/delete actions and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/SettingsPag: Displays a protected settings page placeholder with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed job information and handles application flow with auth, role checks, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobsListPage.tsx: Public job browsing page with search filters, loading/empty states, and a grid of job cards.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/AboutPage.t: Static marketing page describing the platform’s mission, UK focus, and values.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/CandidatesP: Marketing page for candidates outlining the job‑search process and linking to job listings.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/ContactPage: Contact page showing email options, support info, and office hours.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/EmployersPa: Marketing page for employers with hero, step-by-step hiring process, and job posting CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs using an accordion component with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/HomePage.ts: Homepage showcasing hero section, CTAs for candidates and employers, UK map placeholder, and value props.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SuccessStor: Shows testimonials from users with ratings and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom theming, colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current architectural plan, features, and requirements for building the HOSPO TALENT platform, including frontend, backend, auth, data model, and UI directives. Serves as a central project blueprint with no active issues.
